module.name: default
module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib:/lib" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -Ae +DAportable +Onofltacc +Onoentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-linux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -readonly_strings" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xO2 -xtarget=generic" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; esac
CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ LDFLAGS="${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_ZLIB_LIB} ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ GNUMAKE=gmake ./configure --datadir="${_datadir}" \ --enable-shared --enable-static --with-zlib=${SB_VAR_ZLIB} \ ${ARGS+${ARGS}} --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
# quote \@ for perl _p_zlib_lib=$(echo ${SB_VAR_ZLIB_LIB} | sed 's/@/\\@/')
${SB_VAR_PERL}/bin/perl -pi -e "\ s!-L(\\\${exec_prefix}/lib) !-L\$1 ${CC_LD_RT}\$1:${_p_zlib_lib} !" \ builds/unix/freetype-config
${SB_VAR_PERL}/bin/perl -pi -e "\ s!-L(\\\${libdir})!-L\$1 ${CC_LD_RT}\$1:${_p_zlib_lib}!" \ builds/unix/freetype2.pc
